createAccount.existingAccountMessage: You already have a customer account set up. You can proceed to create your bank account.
createAccount.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number

phoneValidation.venezuela: Venezuelan numbers must be +58 followed by 9-10 digits
phoneValidation.colombia: Colombian numbers must be +57 followed by 10 digits
phoneValidation.argentina: Argentine numbers must be +54 followed by 10-11 digits
phoneValidation.mexico: Mexican numbers must be +52 followed by 10 digits
phoneValidation.brazil: Brazilian numbers must be +55 followed by 10-11 digits
phoneValidation.chile: Chilean numbers must be +56 followed by 9 digits
phoneValidation.guatemala: Guatemalan numbers must be +502 followed by 8 digits
phoneValidation.panama: Panamanian numbers must be +507 followed by 7-8 digits
phoneValidation.uk: UK numbers must be +44 followed by 10 digits
